item.title: Type system of the React compiler
item.description: The post describes how the type system of the React compiler is implemented and used
item.dc:creator: Sathya Gunasekaran

item.title: Compiler Theory and Reactivity
item.description: The post describes how the React Compiler uses SSA form for fine grained reactivity
item.dc:creator: Sathya Gunasekaran

item.title: Alias analysis in the React Compiler
item.description: The post describes the complexities of alias analysis in the React Compiler
item.dc:creator: Sathya Gunasekaran

item.title: Side effecting a deopt
item.description: This article explains how a deoptimisation can occur as a side effect in Javascript, especially in v8.
item.dc:creator: Sathya Gunasekaran

item.title: Internationalization APIs in V8
item.description: The JavaScript Internationalization API is growing, and its V8 implementation is getting faster!
item.dc:creator: Sathya Gunasekaran

item.title: Optimizing hash tables in V8
item.description: Several JavaScript data structures such as Map, Set, WeakSet, and WeakMap use hash tables under the hood. This article explains how V8 v6.3 improves hash table performance.
item.dc:creator: Sathya Gunasekaran
